website_summaries.verdict: A great value for a large kit of good quality, though can’t repair the iPhone 7.
pros: Includes lots of extras for easier repairs, such as antistatic wrist strap, multiple tweezers and multiple prying tools
Newer versions have bits for the iPhone 7
cons: Fabric inside case not very durable
Plastic box that holds bits is flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Case, Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The case is sturdy and fancy, but the driver handle is very difficult to get out. Worse, the bits are barely magnetized, and some aren't magnetized at all. Similarly, the magnet intended to hold the bits in is so weak it can't do the job properly. You're better off spending a little more for higher quality items
customer_reviews.author: C. Coker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: it comes in an awesome case, all the bits you need for laptop/macbook repairs. i bought this to replace my hdd for an ssd in my macbook. all the bits are magnetic which makes it easy to get tiny screws out of the laptop. also the screwdriver itself has a swivel top which makes it easy to turn the screwdriver quickly. its pretty neat. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matty🚒

customer_reviews.title: Great buy repair kit
customer_reviews.text: This repair kit comes with almost every thing you need to repair your computer ,or cell phone . One thing I didnt like is the bits are free to fall once opened; the bits are held in place by a magnet but I'm clumsy , everything everything else about this inexpensive repair kit is great . Used this kit last night to replace a hardrive worked great.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Not just for your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of repair on electronic products for the family. Computer, phones, MP3 players (yes we still have some MP3 players). I have a set of tools, but they do not have magnetic tips. Time to step up the game. The drivers, handle and extensions that come with the set are well made and the various bit should meet most needs. The kit also includes tools for opening products like phones and computers. It has a set of tweezers for dealing with small parts. Even includes a precision knife. There's a very nice carrying case for everything. If you're looking for an electronics tool kit, I recommend you take a look at this one.
customer_reviews.author: EFrog

customer_reviews.title: Great First Toolkit
customer_reviews.text: I have never opened a laptop before and I needed to make sure I had all the tools to get the job done. This toolkit has everything I needed. Given, I probably only used about 5% of the tools. But that’s what makes this such a good value. I could imagine it would be able to open any laptop. The plastic tools from popping off the cover worked great. None of them broke, as well as none of them left marks on my laptop. I recommend this to anyone who needs to work on small electronic devices and wants a toolkit that will cover a wide range of products.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but could be even better
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of the product is excellent, and no complaints at all when it comes to the overall quality. I got this to open up a laptop and it worked great, but it would have worked really really awesome, if the bits themselves also had a very slight magnetic pull. The bits have a magnet at the bottom to stay into the handle of the tool, but if there was one at the top of the bits too, my specific job would have actually been much easier and I have seen cheaper and less quality tools with that capability and I think it's a must for opening up computers at least.
customer_reviews.author: Riccardo Esclapon

customer_reviews.title: Great seller !
customer_reviews.text: I got this set several months ago. I emailed the seller with a minor complaint about the lightweight plastic used in the tool tray. I thought they might hook me up with a new tray NOPE Sent me an entirely new set of the boxed tools. It's aces too.
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: The product had potential nice drivers.
customer_reviews.text: The driver and bird are nice but the case was great as it clicked in and out to secure it being slid closed. That only worked a few times and was disappointing when it stopped. I just tuck it in it’s box but I caa as my bother to replace it when it may break again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: This set has all the tools I need to work on phones, laptops as well as the newer All-in-One desktop. The plastic case that house the precision screw drivers and bits can be better especially the tray. Although the tool material quality is not the best, but it is not bad. If you factor the price, it is a steal. I'd recommend my friend to get this if they need to works on electronics stuff.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: For a Hobbyist This is Great
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for folks that do this day in and day out but as a hobbyist I'm really pleased with this kit. It's got everything I've needed to get into a tablet and replace the battery and put in a new SSD drive in a laptop. All the tools I needed were there and it made my life a lot easier! Nice to be able to repair or upgrade electronics on your own if you got a little bit of know-how and this kit really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Version Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cheaper version to open up my 2015 Macbook Pro 13 inch to get to its SSD. Works like expected, the case is a nice matte material that ejects the tools with a press of a button. The holding case is slightly magnetic to keep the tips in place. I think the screwdriver itself was not magnetic (I cant remember and I'm not home) so bare that in mind. Otherwise great buy for its price and what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Could use more torx sizes and bits
customer_reviews.text: Nice item all in all. Nice case that holds the bits well and the seem to be some what sturdy (if a screw is tough to get out and you force it you will mess these bits up including any bit this small so if it's tough to break it free then tighten it more before you try to unscrew it . It really will break it free) My only complaint is it dosen't come with very many of the torx bit sizes which is probably the most used.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: I needed a tool kit with all the gadgets I have and this fits well.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool wrap to keep everything together. This is not a kit that you loan out since the bits are so small and easily lost and must be replaced immediately from where you draw them from. I have a silicone sheet to catch all small fasteners and bits so nothing gets lost. This kit has most everything a DIY will ever need. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer reporter

customer_reviews.title: No more drifting controllers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit half due to needing to fix a joy con drifting issue and half because I wanted to start teaching myself how to do some other small electronic repairs. For $20, this kit came with every kind of screwdriver head I could think of and some very helpful other pieces that I didn't realize I would need. I love that it came with a couple of opening tools that made cutting through adhesive much easier. I am so happy with this purchase and have recommended it to my co workers (we work in a phone store) for all of their electronics as well. Much better value that an iFixit kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The package design looks good. However, the quality is not good enough. Amazon sent me a replacement after the box broke (it can't close). The replacement didn't work either: the box was fine but the screw tip can't even connect.....useless! I had to return the second time and asked for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This tiny powerhouse of a tool kit has just about everything you need to work on any of your electronics. Everything from your wristwatch to your home server can be serviced with this toolkit, including your phones and tablets. In the first month alone, I've found myself using this kit more than my standard home kit from the garage, due to its compact size and versatility. The build quality is quite cheap, overall, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: EchoAlphaSierra

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools to work on you small electronic projects with.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great set of screwdrivers for small electronic project. Combined these with another kit I have and the compact design fits right in the kit. Bits are held in magnetically and symbols below the bits are a little hard to read, but each bit has the size and type etched into them which is must easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: Every screw bit that you need!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this to repair a broken Nintendo that was giving to me. I had to replace the sd memory card reader. without this tool set, I would have never had gotten the system opened It can also be used on all other game consoles. This is a must have for someone that likes to tinker with things!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size bit for 2015 mbp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 2015 mbp screws, but bits were a little too small and had a tendency to strip the screwhead. Bit driver is also a little too smooth even at the finger grip area, feels a little unnatural. Otherwise, bits are decent and case design is well done.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried it out yet, but...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set and so far, I'm highly impressed with the quality of the product. I will update when I use it. I had a "broken down" set that I had misplaced a few pieces, but it was nothing like this set. If something occurs that is different, I will let y'all know.
customer_reviews.author: D. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Screw bit tip broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fix my laptop. The first screw was immediately stripped. So I changed the head and tried a different screwdriver bit and that one literally broke off the first second I turned it. We are returning the product. So cheap it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: MSH

customer_reviews.title: This has become my daily set, exceptional quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I apologize for my initial review. After using these further they have replaced over $100 worth of mix and match bits I have found over the years. I do have a couple minor suggestions(slightly stronger magnets, more form fitting slots for the bits, less for the handle) that would make a 2.0 perfect. Feel free to contact me, otherwise keep doing what you're doing. Matt, CWP
customer_reviews.author: OneThirtySeven

customer_reviews.title: Good for a hobbyist.
customer_reviews.text: This are a decent for the price if you're a hobbyist. But if you rely on these kinds of tool for a living these are a bit lacking in material and construction. The extender broke on first use, the metal of the tips also gives when encountering a tight screw. On the plus side they are comfortable to hold and the case is good quality, as well as the metal pry tools.
customer_reviews.author: David Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This little kit is exactly what I needed for all the random tinkering that's part of building a water-cooled PC. The case is nice, and the magnetized tips are perfect for not losing tiny screw. I'm super impressed with what you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Infinite Kangaroos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kit, Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: For what you're paying this is an amazing buy! Everything seems well made and is working great so far. The ONLY knock I could possibly give this would be it only comes with 1 cup and not 2, but they are cheap to grab another and throw in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: special tools - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a set of pretty specialized tools which are not available on every street corner. I'm not a heavy user so I can't really speak to durability. The pieces certainly look like good quality. What use I had, the fit and function was good. The case is clever and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Respect!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Super awesome product. Quality!!! Yes seems simple to expect. This is more than you expect. Such a great thing to see how this company's future should set the bar for a lot to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Keri tuten

customer_reviews.title: WORSE CASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: WORSE CASE EVER..... YOU'LL CONSTANTLY HAVE THE CASE OPEN UNEXPECTEDLY AND GOD HELP YOU IF YOU DROP IT... YOU'LL BE PICKING UP PIECES FOR DAYS... GET A DIFFERENT KIT WITH A BETTER DESIGNED CASE...
customer_reviews.author: BLUE

customer_reviews.title: Case broke, weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: The kit is nice in what it includes, and it is well made. The case is a cool design, but flawed. Whatever mechanism used for getting the tray out easily broke, so the screwdrivers just get stuck in there if you push the inner tray/container all the way into the outer case. The magnetization on the screwdrivers is also very weak. It isn't strong enough to lift a screw out of a PC case for example.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Goodzeit

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to decide on this or the iFixit kit. Went with this b/c the iFixit kit was way overpriced. So far i am pretty pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Joseph Plunkett Jr

customer_reviews.title: Case snap-in function stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: A handy little screw driver set, but the case snap-in stopped working, so the bits are not held in and are very likely to fall all over the place if moved. Not very handy if you have to keep them in one location.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Duimstra

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised in the quality of these tools. I was able to break down, repair and reassemble my Canon digital camera andGarmin GPS. You need these if you hate throwing expensive devices out that you know you can repair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Helton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and elegant screwdriver kit. Great kit.
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver set comes in a sturdy small box, ideal to carry without even noticing it. The screwdrivers are made of a long-lasting material. Very stylish and elegant design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Postman

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of tools for the $$ if you're a DIY repair type
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy it again. It had what I needed to open an old MacBook Pro and remove the hard drive, SATA cable, and battery. The magnetic tip drivers are great with tiny screws and parts!!
customer_reviews.author: TexasMusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This little tool-set was great. It has a large variety of shapes/sizes and even some of the weirder ones that I needed for Apple products. Worked great, bits are high quality, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: nice tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool kit, seem to be quality parts. Case is great, very convenient. So far just used to tighten up pocket knives, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this screwdriver set. Everything about it says premium quality. The case is nice and opens with a push. The handle is solid and metal. The bits look great too. The tweezers are very useful and it is great to have them in the set. I found myself using them a lot while replacing a cracked smart phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and I'm really impressed with the quality. Even the case is magnetized so the bits don't fall out. A really good buy from the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brice L. Burtch

customer_reviews.title: Product is high quality, but one issue
customer_reviews.text: The product works very nice I recommend it. But the only thing is, the screw driver magnet is very sensitive so the head can come off easily. Especially when your are tightening something. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves!
customer_reviews.text: Husband works on small electronics and was always digging through his tools to find the right sized screwdriver or bit. He loves this set with everything he couId need in a pouch and organized.
customer_reviews.author: NANAof2_1518

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of attachments, single handle
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this - the feel, the quality, the attractive and useful and well built case to hold everything. even has magnetic slots in which to return attachments to keep them sorted. Only reason for deducting a star is that there is not much grip on the handle itself for loosening of stubbornly tight screws.
customer_reviews.author: glove user

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My nice iTool kit was stolen and I blanched at paying for it again. I “cheaped out” and got this. It is very good and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: What a great value
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Can't beat this value. The prying tools have many other uses, such as scrubbing dirt, glue residue, or caulking. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. The tips seem harder than other sets I've tried. The case is nice, and the grey bit holder is magnetic to hold the bits in place. Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William H Pierson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to have at home.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I will ever need. A definite must have for any home.
customer_reviews.author: harpster12

customer_reviews.title: Exudes Quality
customer_reviews.text: Right from the start I was impressed. The case is handsome with a nice spring closure. The bits are magnetically held in place. The tweezers are super fine point and all parts have a good quality feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harms

customer_reviews.title: Quality bits, convenient case.
customer_reviews.text: This compact computer tool set has excellent build quality from the bits and handle to the push to open compact case.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H

customer_reviews.title: Best precision toolkit I’ve found so far
customer_reviews.text: You get a wide array of tools for what you pay and they are of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I can tell someone wanted these tools to last a long time. Great buy if you do a lot of electronics repair.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to fix my HDD. I used the T5 head to unscrew the small screws holding the HDD cover. After unscrewing a couple of them, I noticed a small chip fell off the tip of the tool. The tool still works but I expected it to be way more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Moji

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for building a pc
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all the different screw heads I needed for building my PC and it's very portable.
customer_reviews.author: CoYoFroYo

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really good, high quality and exceptionally well made. Provides a lot of turning power from the hardened tips. The magnetic hold is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Wurlitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make some hardware upgrades on my computer. This set is just what I was looking for. Well-priced, durable, and comes with a little case to store tools/keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: works well but magnet came loose
customer_reviews.text: i like it, nice package design, easy to use but the magnet came loose after one use. i suppose i could of glued it back in but the old was quite small... didnt want to mess with it. got a refund
customer_reviews.author: JASON CRABTREE

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Small and compact with sturdy tools. Used it for opening the back panel of my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Vuong

customer_reviews.title: GGreat tool set for Phone repair
customer_reviews.text: I use it for replacing screens on iPhones the magnetic tips are really nice, those screws are very small so this tool set is worth its weight in gold!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use them to open my laptop up and they did the job and they have managed to hold for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Kamm

customer_reviews.title: Very good overall!
customer_reviews.text: The sharp pry tool (or whatever it is) is so fine it bends very easily. Otherwise a magnificent set! Still pretty happy with the purchase, even with the issue with the one tool. I love the case.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefRoyal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multi-functional tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multi-functional tool, although I have little time with it, I already do some typical tasks and it was very useful and versatile
customer_reviews.author: RocheJM

customer_reviews.title: magnetic case
customer_reviews.text: The case is magnetic, so the bits don't roll out, and they've been magnetized enough to pick up screws. The case seems surprisingly well designed. The driver itself has a little bit on the butt end that spins freely.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bugher

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when I started my job as a IT Desktop Support (alot of computer fixing) cause I figured it would be something that would be useful to have...I am safe to say, it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Evans

customer_reviews.title: A WOW ITEM!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tool set. The components look very, very good. The case is just great.
customer_reviews.author: DOC L.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a great price compared to other tool kits. It had more than enough tools to dissemble our ASUS laptop.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew Cole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toolset in my Tool Locker!
customer_reviews.text: I like the toolset. It has everything I need for ongoing technical repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dugent

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to fix my laptop. It came well packaged and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: kefim joefield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Came as advertised. Very good starter kit for electronic repair.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Weak Magnet (small set)
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the two larger options, but I ordered the small one and the magnet was so weak that the bits didn't even stay in, making it pretty much useless. Returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mini screwdriver set. Case is very cool and quality is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Everything AND the kitchen sink. Very nice and well priced. Love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Juan in Chattanooga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Helped me fix my iPhone no problem. Just be careful with the smaller sizes since, as with most tools, too much pressure can warp and strip the ends of the smaller driver heads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves it! Uses it all the time to build his computers for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the basics. Hard case, not a crappy clamshell. Price is right. Cant go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a kit to swap out a hard drive in my Macbook Pro. After much searching and product reading I decided on this set. So glad I did. Bits and screwdriver worked perfectly, and I must say that the case it comes in is magnetic, sleek, and was a pleasant surprise. Just swapped my drive and reattached the MBP casing with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Nobili

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck?
customer_reviews.text: It has everything you need to fix laptops and computers even phones!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of tools and the case they're in.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Everything you will need.
customer_reviews.text: Great variety. Can't really do heavy work like screwing thing into wood but its clearly not designed for that. It will work incredibly in all things tech and you should find no problem as long as you are using it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product does provide grate variety and seems to be made of good quality material but the magnetic strength is weak barely notice it at all, disappointing seeing as it was the main point for purchasing this set
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy overall
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers weren't amazing, but everything else about the set was worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Would like to see improved storage Overall a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: Every do-it-yourselfer should have this screwdriver set in their tool box.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the driver itself is super cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Bits fall out of driver, so I was constantly flinging bits around. Really obnoxious. Total garbage. Magnetic tips are weak too. No idea how this made it to market, it's really awful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this set I use this set everyday and havnt broken any pieces yet
customer_reviews.author: Masstar

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Anyone reading this and thinking about buying this, you should. It got everything and I used it for my laptop and smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, for the money. Came with everything needed to do simple repairs.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Better than iFixit
customer_reviews.text: Get this over the iFixit Kit for sure. I use these on the daily for PC repair/refurbishing.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t drop the box and you’re good
customer_reviews.text: Son loved as a gift, only down side is son is a klutz like his mom, dropped it the second he got it and the push action lock doesn’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: With Prime Shipping was here quickly. The srew drive seems more than adequate. Every bit you will probably ever need as a hobbyist/enthusiast. Plus extras like spunges, grounding strap, industrial type tweezers and exacto knife. In one word, "Pleased."
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kaba

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic and the tips fall easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the set, but mine was not magnetic, also the tips fall from the handle.
customer_reviews.author: AlexV

customer_reviews.title: Great little set.
customer_reviews.text: Super assortment for a very low price. Unique, compact storage case. I bought a second one to keep in my job tool box.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Adaptibility
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we wanted and expected. I highly recommend this to anyone that has the need for tools who likes to tinker with the exceptionally small stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cmarracino

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A plethora of bits. Would give five stars, but bit trays aren't the sturdiest and don't contain the "plethora of bits" the best. Good value for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need OTG
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you could need. Only thing I would like is the triangle paddle. Seems to come in handy more times than not. But the blue pry tools seem to work well with laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: An awesome tool collection for fixing phones
customer_reviews.text: My teen fixed 3 screens already with this set, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alli Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Portable laptop toolkit
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. Used it at work on a small project and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera McCoy

customer_reviews.title: has nearly everything for small electronics
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to eplace the screens on 2 LG phones as well as work on a Logitech mouse, has everything needed for these jobs
customer_reviews.author: James Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great tools but....
customer_reviews.text: Tools work great, loved the magnetic feature. The only dislike I have on the product was when I unlocked and removed the tool tray it would not lock back in to the case after use.
customer_reviews.author: denys larosa

customer_reviews.title: No comparison
customer_reviews.text: High quality levels can be felt ,from the casing to the tools, outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Quantity for its price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to do PC repairs. Had everything I needed. Nothing felt cheap for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I reconvene this to anyone who works with small screws. I used this specifically to build my PC and am happy that it has all the sizes I need.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Segura

product_meta.title: XOOL Precision Screwdriver Set, 80 in 1 Magnetic Repair Tool Kit, Screwdriver Kit with Portable Bag for iPhone, iPad, MacBook, Gaming Console, Controller
feature_bullets: 【Wide Application】XOOL 80 in 1 Multi-functional bag tool kit is designed to service all popular iPad, iPhone, MacBook, PC, Watches, Glasses, Laptops, Phones, Game Consoles,PS4/Xbox Controller, Tablet and other most of electronics.

【Most Economical】This Precision Screwdriver Set have more tools, which includes utility knife, Anti-Static tweezers, Anti-Static Wrist Strap, SIM card ejector pin and LCD Suction Cup, Triangle plectrum, plastic spudgers, metal spudgers, SIM card shells, Magnetizing and demagnetizing tool, etc. Add Special Phillips and Y-tip Screwdriver are for removing the iPhone Middle Plate 's screws. Both of screwdriver are also suitable for repairing iPhone SE / 7 / 7 Plus /6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / iPod.

【High Quality】56 different bits are made of CR-V steel, which is high hardness, good toughness, strength and durable. The unique driver is skid proof as well as anti static, which makes it be held more easily and safer for a long time. Stainless steel ESD precision tweezers resistant to most acids and other corrosive agents.

【Anti-static and Magnetic】Multi-magnetic driver makes it easy to fix bit and pull screws out, a flexible shaft included is perfect for electronics where the shaft is hard to get. Every tweezers is plated resistive ESD coating, which prevents static damage to electronic components. The kit add anti-static wrist strap that helps to protect electronics from static.
【Portable】 This precision screwdriver set pack with a storage bag that is made from Oxford, offering a whole protection and easier storage and carrying.
